item.title: 银行资产负债表堵塞导致关键回购融资利率飙升
item.description: 与金融系统日常借贷需求挂钩的关键利率创下了年初以来的最高水平，原因是国债拍卖结算量巨大，一级交易商资产负债表堵塞，抑制了借贷能力。【原文：A key rate tied to the day-to-day borrowing needs of the financial system hit the highest level since the beginning of the year as chunky Treasury auction settlements and clogged primary dealer balance sheets curbed lending capacity.】

item.title: 以太币 ETF 有望最快于七月中旬获得美国证券交易委员会批准
item.description: 资产管理公司乐观地认为，美国证券交易委员会最快将在 7 月中旬为首批直接投资以太币的美国 ETF 基金开绿灯，并表示与监管机构的来回沟通仍具有建设性。【原文：Asset managers are optimistic that the SEC will greenlight the first US ETFs that invest directly in Ether as soon as mid-July, saying the back and forth with the regulator remains constructive.】

item.title: 艾芬豪公司将新锌矿的产量出售给特拉菲古拉公司和中国中信集团
item.description: 艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.）将向特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）和中国中信金属有限公司（Citic Metal Co.【原文：Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. will sell the zinc it produces from a large new mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo to Trafigura Group and China’s Citic Metal Co.】

item.title: 北方数据或将以IPO为单位测试人工智能狂潮的极限
item.description: 德国一家由稳定币巨头 Tether 集团支持的小型加密货币公司正瞄准高目标，准备将其人工智能云计算部门纳入潜在上市计划，这笔交易可能会让股市对人工智能的狂热经受考验。【原文：A small German crypto company backed by stablecoin giant Tether Group is aiming high in a potential listing that includes its artificial intelligence cloud computing unit, in a deal that may put the stock-market frenzy for all things AI to the test.】

item.title: S&P 公司称卡车零部件制造商 Accuride 的违约风险上升
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）称，商用卡车零部件制造商Accuride Corp.公司在采取定价行动和需求低于预期的情况下正在消耗现金，从而提高了明年债务违约或重组的风险。【原文：Commercial-truck parts maker Accuride Corp. is burning cash in the wake of pricing actions and weaker-than-expected demand, raising debt default or restructuring risks within the next year, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 拉加德重申欧洲央行在法国大选之际 "关注 "收益率问题
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德重申，欧洲中央银行 "关注 "债券市场，同时拒绝对她的祖国法国的选举斗争发表评论。【原文：Christine Lagarde repeated that the European Central Bank is “attentive” to the bond market, while declining to comment on the election fight dominating her home country of France.】

item.title: Wizz Air 预计将在六个月内对进入印度市场的计划作出回应
item.description: Wizz Air Holdings Plc 预计将在未来 6 个月内了解其开通飞往该国航班计划的进展情况，匈牙利低成本航空公司的目标是在这段时间内接收首批可服务于该航线的空客 SE 喷气式飞机。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc expects to find out the status of its plans to start flights to the country in the next six months, around the time that the Hungarian low-cost carrier aims to take delivery of the first Airbus SE jets that can serve the route.】

item.title: 瑞穗聘请前OTPP 高管 Karen Frank 担任欧洲、中东和非洲地区业务高级顾问
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. is hiring former Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan executive Karen Frank as a senior adviser for its Europe, the Middle East and Africa business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说 Robinhood 考虑在美国和欧洲提供加密货币期货
item.description: 据熟悉免佣金投资和交易平台计划的人士透露，Robinhood Markets 公司正考虑在未来几个月内在美国和欧洲推出加密货币期货。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is considering offering cryptocurrency futures in the US and Europe in the coming months, according to people familiar with the commission-free investing and trading platform’s plan.】

item.title: 说唱歌手 Jay-Z 支持奢侈手表平台 Wristcheck
item.description: 嘻哈音乐人肖恩-"Jay-Z"-卡特（Shawn "Jay-Z" Carter）入股奢侈品交易平台 Wristcheck，成为在线手表市场最新的名人支持者。【原文：Hip-hop musician Shawn “Jay-Z” Carter has become the latest celebrity backer of the online watch market after taking an equity stake in luxury trading platform Wristcheck.】

item.title: 阿根廷 15 年来首次将玉米运往中国
item.description: 阿根廷正准备向中国运送玉米，这将是两国 15 年来首次运送玉米，也是两国扩大农产品贸易的最新举措。【原文：Argentina is preparing corn shipments to China that will be the first in 15 years, in the latest move by the two countries to expand agricultural trade.】

item.title: 候选人退休以遏制极右翼势力，法国债券上涨
item.description: 有报道称，在周日的第二轮投票后，各政党正在设法阻止极右翼获得绝对多数，法国债券因此上涨。【原文：French bonds gained amid reports that political parties are maneuvering to block an absolute majority for the far-right after Sunday’s second-round vote.】

item.title: 米莱总统对阿根廷银行股有利有弊
item.description: 由于政府降低利率并限制新的借贷，阿根廷银行业股票在纽约暴跌，这使它们失去了推动利润增长的宽松资金。【原文：Argentine banking stocks in New York are tumbling as the government slashes interest rates and crimps new borrowing, robbing them of the easy money that had been driving profits higher.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行不需要 2% 的服务业通胀率
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲央行不需要服务通胀— 决策者在决定降息幅度时的一个主要关注点— 放缓至2%的目标。【原文：The European Central Bank doesn’t need services inflation — a key focus as policymakers determine how much to lower interest rates — to slow to the 2% target, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 鲍威尔对近期数据表示欢迎，但美联储需要更多信心才能削减开支
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，最新的经济数据表明通胀正在重回下行轨道，但他补充说，官员们希望在降息前看到更多数据。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said the latest economic data suggest inflation is getting back on a downward path, but added officials would like to see more data before lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 迪拜将建三座办公大楼，避开全球经济衰退
item.description: 迪拜正在其金融区中心地带新建三座办公大楼，以满足日益增长的需求，这与全球城市商业地产出租率的下滑形成了鲜明对比。【原文：Dubai is building three new office towers in the heart of its financial district, expanding to catch up with rising demand in stark contrast to slumping occupancy rates for commercial property in cities around the world.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会准备对 Tempur Sealy 床垫公司的收购提起诉讼
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，美国联邦贸易委员会准备提起诉讼，阻止 Tempur Sealy International Inc.【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission is poised to sue to block Tempur Sealy International Inc.’s $4 billion proposed deal with Mattress Firm Inc., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧佩克石油收入去年下滑 18%，原因是价格下跌
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）称，由于原油价格下跌，该组织去年的石油收入下滑了 18%，并开始实施新的减产措施以平衡全球市场。【原文：OPEC said its oil revenues slumped by 18% last year, as crude prices cooled and the group embarked on new production cuts to balance global markets.】

item.title: 人工智能加密初创公司融资 8500 万美元，泰尔基金领投
item.description: Sentient Labs 是一家成立仅数月的人工智能初创公司，由 Polygon 区块链背后的一位高管联合创办，该公司从包括亿万富翁彼得-蒂尔的创始人基金在内的投资者那里筹集了 8500 万美元。【原文：Sentient Labs, a months-old artificial intelligence startup co-founded by an executive behind the Polygon blockchain, raised $85 million from investors including billionaire Peter Thiel’s Founders Fund.】

item.title: 鲍威尔、拉加德和坎波斯-内图将在欧洲央行论坛上发表演讲
item.description: 7 月 2 日，克里斯蒂娜-拉加德和杰罗姆-鲍威尔在辛特拉举行的欧洲央行中央银行论坛上。 摄影师：Your Image for ECB【原文：Christine Lagarde and Jerome Powell at the ECB Forum on Central Banking, in Sintra, on July 2. Photographer: Your Image for ECB】

item.title: 伦敦金融城推迟就广场一英里最高塔楼作出决定
item.description: 伦敦金融城公司推迟了对在小黄瓜旁新建一座 73 层办公大楼计划的投票，这座大楼将成为历史悠久的金融区最高的建筑。【原文：The City of London Corporation deferred a vote on plans for a new 73-story office tower next to the Gherkin that’s set to become the tallest building in the historic financial district.】

item.title: CFA 二级通过率飙升至 59%，创 1998 年以来新高
item.description: 由于推迟考试的考生人数减少，特许金融分析师二级考试的通过率跃升至四分之一多世纪以来的最高水平。【原文：The pass rate for the second level of the chartered financial analyst exam jumped to the highest in more than a quarter century, boosted by a smaller number of candidates who had deferred their tests.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司计划退出南非近海天然气勘探项目
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，道达尔能源 SE 公司计划退出在南非一角附近的天然气凝析油勘探，优先考虑在靠近纳米比亚的其他地区进行勘探。【原文：TotalEnergies SE plans to exit its discoveries of gas-condensate off the tip of South Africa to prioritize exploration in other areas closer to Namibia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 智利利用债务市场发行 7 年期社会债券
item.description: 智利正通过发行社会债券来开拓债务市场，这是新兴市场主权国家在 2024 年前几个月的热潮过后，在下半年首次出售债券。【原文：Chile is tapping debt markets with a social bond, one of the first sales by emerging-market sovereigns in what’s expected to be a slower second half of the year after a flurry of activity in the first few months of 2024.】

item.title: 制药巨头声称在英国 Covid 疫苗利润案中部分胜诉
item.description: 在伦敦一名法官裁定 Moderna 公司两项专利中的一项有效后，Moderna 公司在试图从辉瑞公司和 BioNTech SE 公司销售 Covid-19 疫苗获得的数十亿美元利润中分一杯羹的努力中取得了部分胜利。【原文：Moderna Inc. scored a partial victory in its attempt to claim a share of billions of dollars in profits made by Pfizer Inc and BioNTech SE selling Covid-19 vaccine, after a London judge ruled that one of its two patents was valid.】

item.title: Citadel、千禧年上半年涨幅扩大，回报持续增长
item.description: Ken Griffin 的 Citadel 和 Izzy Englander 的千禧管理公司在 6 月份扩大了今年迄今为止的涨幅，彰显了其提供稳定回报的声誉。【原文：Ken Griffin’s Citadel and Izzy Englander’s Millennium Management extended their year-to-date gains in June, underlining their reputations for delivering a steady stream of returns.】

item.title: 中国万科房屋销售停滞不前，房地产前景模糊不清
item.description: 在中国陷入困境的房地产市场出现改善迹象的同时，中国万科集团公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China Vanke Co.’s home sales saw growth stall in June, amid signs of improvement elsewhere in China’s beleaguered housing market.】

item.title: 卢拉说中央银行不能为市场服务
item.description: 路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统对巴西中央银行的攻击升级，称罗伯托-坎波斯-内托行长领导的机构需要真正自主，而不是被金融市场 "拥有"。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva escalated his attacks on Brazil’s central bank, saying the institution led by Governor Roberto Campos Neto needs to be really autonomous and not “owned” by financial markets.】

item.title: 银行家抗议刚果持股规定过于苛刻
item.description: 刚果民主共和国的银行正敦促当局重新考虑要求贷款人将股权分散至多达 45% 的规定，称该规定不切实际。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo’s banks are urging authorities to rethink requirements for lenders to diversify their shareholdings by as much as 45%, saying the regulation is impractical.】
